library.description:
Hybrid Mobile App UI Framework for iOS and Material Design with Angular and React Components.

Contains tons of components such as stack navigation, tabs, side menu, buttons, progress bars, switches, form elements and much more.

Made for Cordova/PhoneGap but works just as well in mobile browsers.
library.name: Onsen UI

library.description: An Open-Source JavaScript Library for Mobile-Friendly Interactive Maps.
library.name: Leaflet

library.description: A simple and beautiful JavaScript touch carousel
library.name: ItemSlide

library.description: JavaScript library to emulate native mobile transitions. Designed to be as easy to use as possible. Just look to example from archive.
library.name: Mobile Transitions for Web

library.description: Arctic.js is a game engine for smartphone web browsers written in JavaScript with HTML5 Canvas. It provides a hierarchical display lists, event propagation and useful animation features. These features are used through ActionScript3 friendly APIs which Flash developers are familier to.
library.name: Arctic.js

library.description: jCanvaScript is a javascript library that provides you methods to manage with the content of a HTML5 canvas element easily. It runs on any platform (including iPhone, iPad, Android) that supports canvas and JavaScript. To add support for canvas in Internet Explorer you can use ExCanvas.
library.name: jCanvaScript

library.description: JSXGraph is a cross-browser library for interactive geometry, function plotting, charting, and data visualization in a web browser. It is implemented completely in JavaScript, does not rely on any other library, and uses SVG, VML, or canvas. JSXGraph is easy to embed and has a small footprint: less than 100 KByte if embedded in a web page. No plug-ins are required! Special care has been taken to optimize the performance.
library.name: JSXGraph

library.description: Gamma Gallery is an experimental responsive image gallery that attempts to provide an adjustable responsive images approach taking its grid layout and the full slideshow view into account.
library.name: GammaGallery

library.description: This is a pure JavaScript library to draw 2D graphics on web pages inside web browser without using SVG,VML or Canvas. JavaScript developers, web developers  and webmasters can take advantage of the library to add graphics drawing functionality to their web applications or websites using the library. The library is entirely written in JavaScript and does not need any plug-in or additional software to run/execute. It works even on not-so-smart small screen mobile browsers too.
library.name: jsDraw2D

library.description: AutoComplete is a jQuery Mobile plugin which allows developers to add autoComplete search boxes to your project.
library.name: jQuery Mobile Autocomplete

library.description: jQuery Mobile Boilerplate is meant to be a one stop shop for creating a new jQuery Mobile project
library.name: jQuery Mobile Boilerplate

library.description: Open Source JavaScript game SDK for iOS, Android and Web. Debug in the browser, test in simulator, refresh to update code (no compile, no upload, etc.) Battle tested in several top-10 games. GPLv3 or Game Closure Free License.
library.name: GameClosure

library.description:
A powerful, extensible IoC container for starting a project quickly with a modular API ready to use. Works on Node.js, in the browser (only 4kb) and in mobile.


dependency injection
plugins
lazy loading of object and Node's module
service (provider, factory)
collection handler (get, set, merge, ...)
library.name: Noder.io

library.description:
A JavaScript game development library aiming for compatibility with every desktop browser and mobile device while being fast and modular.

Note that development happens at bitbucket.
library.name: friGame

library.description: Sencha Touch 2, a high-performance HTML5 mobile application framework, is the cornerstone of the Sencha HTML5 platform. Built for enabling world-class user experiences, Sencha Touch 2 is the only framework that enables developers to build fast and impressive apps that work on iOS, Android, BlackBerry, Kindle Fire, and more.
library.name: Sencha Touch 2

library.description: CanvasJS is a standalone HTML5 & JavaScript Charting Library that works across devices including iPhone, iPad, Android, Desktops, etc. It performs 10x better than traditional SVG and Flash based Charts.
library.name: CanvasJS

library.description:
KineticJS is an HTML5 Canvas JavaScript library that extends the 2d context by enabling high performance path detection and pixel detection for desktop and mobile applications.

You can draw things on the stage and then add event listeners to them, move them, scale them, and rotate them independently from other shapes to support high performance animations and transitions.  Served hot with a side of awesomeness.
library.name: KineticJS

library.description: a lawnchair is sorta like a couch except smaller and outside. perfect for html5 mobile apps that need a lightweight, adaptive, simple and elegant persistence solution.
library.name: lawnchair

library.description: An open source automation framework for web and mobile-web testing by HP Software for developers who want to test their web application.
library.name: CatJS

library.description: jPlayer is the completely free and open source (GPL/MIT) media library written in JavaScript. jPlayer allows you to rapidly weave cross platform audio and video into your web pages. jPlayer's comprehensive API allows you to create innovative media solutions while support and encouragement is provided by jPlayer's active and growing community.
library.name: jPlayer
